#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
#include<stdio.h>
#define gc getchar_unlocked
using namespace std;
void sc(int &a)
{
	register int c;
	a = 0;

	c = gc();

	for (; ((c < 48) || (c > 57)); c = gc());
	for (; ((c > 47) && (c < 58)); c = gc()) {
		a = (a << 1) + (a << 3) + c-48;
	}
}
int s[1000004];
int a[1000004];
int main()
{
	int T,N,i;
	
	sc(T);
	
   
	while(T--)
	{   int max=1;
		memset(s,0,sizeof(s)); 
		int m=0;
		sc(N);
		for(i=0;i<N;i++)
		   {
		   	sc(a[i]);
		   	s[a[i]]++;
		   	if(a[i]>m)
		   	  m=a[i];
		   } 
		   int flag=0;
		 for(i=m;i>=2;i--)
		 { 
		 	int cnt=0;
		 	int j=i;
		 	while(j<=m)
		 	  {
		 	  	if(s[j]>0)
		 	  	  {
		 	  	  	cnt+=s[j];
		 	  	  	if(cnt>1)
		 	  	  	  {
		 	  	  	  	cout<<i<<"\n";
		 	  	  	  	flag=1;
		 	  	  	  	break;
		 	  	  	  }
		 	  	  }
		 	  	  j+=i;
		 	  }
		 	  if(flag)
		 	    break;
		  }
		  if(!flag)
		    cout<<1<<"\n";
		    
}
return 0;
}
